3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Asma' bint Abi Bakr that a woman asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) about menstrual blood that gets on clothes. He said:"Scratch it, then rub it with water, then sprinkle water over it, and pray in it

chapter.eng-name: When Menstrual Blood Gets On Clothes
